name: Leather Bound Love Demo
description:
Welcome to your dream job! 

You work at the cutest, family owned bookstore in your town.  The job itself isn't bad at all, and talk about perks! Through work, you meet five handsome bachelors, all with their own stories to tell.  

Who will you choose? Naeem, the handsome store owner; Luca, the lovesick rom-com actor; HarveyLee, the workaholic businessman; Valencio, the loveless thriller author; or Rayon, the drifter with a heart of gold.

Get a taste of the romance with this bite sized demo featuring the first 3 chapters of each characters' routes. The finished product will have ten chapters plus two unique endings for each character, so stay tuned!

The demo is completely free with the option to add a donation. Keep in mind though, the final game will be 5$ and donations will not go toward purchasing the completed version

We encourage all forms of feedback. Real quick though, let us specify the things we are still working on so no one brings them up. The finished game will have a replay menu, so you can go back and replay your favorite chapters. We are still working on completely customizing the UI for the game, so you will notice some things, like buttons and labels, are still on the default setting. Nothing is set in stone, so feel free to make any commentary that you believe would help us make a finished product that you would be more than happy to purchase

Happy reading!
